changelog.note: Warning for browsers with slow scanrate

Revised text and added more info all over the site. Especially in the FAQ and helpful tips. New button linking to Mokeys big Superglide-Guide. Hid analytics when first opening the site, automatically expands when starting the training
Holding shift no longer prevents other inputs
Improvements to color-contrast. Moved tips and FAQ into the middle. New Home Button. New Changelog. New graph in "Show all stats". Small text tweaks.
